title: Audible and B&N Nook remove option to purchase books in Android app as new Play Store rules kick in
content:
Google has been pushing developers to use the company’s Play Billing system for in-app purchases, which gives a small cut to Google (usually 15%) as a processing fee. The deadline was technically last week, and we’re continuing to see apps make changes to comply with the updated rules, which now includes book retailer Barnes &
